predicate.note: Frames file for 'retard' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: make slow

example.name: the one example
example.text: Skilled ringers use their wrists *trace* to advance or retard the next swing, so that one bell can swap places with another in the following change.

roleset.note: Not a bad trick, considering these bells can weigh up to a ton.
